Explore

About Me

Hi, I'm Sharan Muhhuku, a 22-year-old UX Design student from Uganda, currently in my second year at Wilfrid Laurier University. I’m passionate about crafting intuitive and user-centered digital experiences. With a keen eye for detail and a love for problem-solving, I strive to translate user needs into innovative design solutions.

My UX Portfolio

One of the major projects I’ve completed is this portfolio. It showcases my growth as a UX designer and incorporates everything I’ve learned this semester.

Waste Sorting Game

This group project involved designing a game to teach children about waste sorting in a fun, interactive way. It used color-coded bins and cards to represent various types of waste.

Accessibility Straw

A prototype designed to assist individuals with mobility challenges. Features include a textured grip, flexible neck, and wide mouthpiece for easier drinking.

Send me your email. I’d love to hear from you!
